items.sentence: Tom was apparently murdered while he was sleeping.
Tom was looking forward to having a few weeks off.
Tom was obviously worried about what might happen.
Copy what\'s on the blackboard into your notebook.
Could you tell Tom why you don\'t want to do that?
Don\'t be offended. Tom\'s that way with everyone.
Even if it isn\'t true, it\'s still rather clever.
Tom told us he didn\'t want to play poker with us.
This is one of the shortest books that I\'ve read.
I wish I\'d known that Tom couldn\'t speak French.
I\'ve already read the book you\'re talking about.
Tom is one of the few people that understand Mary.
Tom is the happiest person in the world right now.
Tom is the one least likely to come to your party.
Tom is the person who actually pulled the trigger.
Tom is very good at playing songs by Eric Clapton.
Tom is waiting for Mary outside the movie theater.
That tower you see over there is the Eiffel Tower.
The building is surrounded by a barbed wire fence.
The longer I stayed in Paris, the more I liked it.
The new designs are much better than the old ones.
The only thing Tom needs now is a little patience.
The pears we eat in Japan look almost like apples.
Tom downed the rest of his drink and left the bar.
Tom felt very uncomfortable about the whole thing.
I wish we had more people like Tom working for us.
I wish you the best of luck in your next endeavor.
I wonder how Tom and Mary are enjoying themselves.
I wonder how many planets in our galaxy have life.
Take this medicine, and you\'ll feel a lot better.
Tell Tom that Mary doesn\'t want him to come over.
Tom knew he shouldn\'t be doing what he was doing.
Tom wanted to explain, but Mary wouldn\'t let him.
There aren\'t many good tunes coming out nowadays.
There weren\'t any children in the park yesterday.
There\'s a rumor going around that Tom likes Mary.
Most people nowadays don\'t understand friendship.
Why aren\'t you using the new pen I just gave you?
You\'re not getting away from me that easily, Tom.
Tom believes that Mary is trying to discredit him.
Being left alone, the boy didn\'t know what to do.
Can somebody please tell me what\'s going on here?
I think it\'s time for me to contact him by phone.
I think it\'s time for me to start cooking dinner.
I think it\'s time for me to throw a little party.
I think it\'s time for us to come to an agreement.
You must learn English whether you like it or not.
I don\'t know what to say to make you feel better.
I don\'t think Tom did anything about the problem.
It\'s clear they both want to spend time together.
